verbose_text: We found that in patients with advanced stage tumor (stage III + IV), the heterozygous variant (WV) and homozygous variant (VV) genotypes in both rs2304497 and rs9912300 reduced the death risk of CRC in the dominant model (HR = 0.47, 95% CI = 0.24-0.90 and HR = 0.59, 95% CI = 0.37-0.92, respectively).
evidence: rs2304497 and rs9912300 reduced the death risk of CRC
